mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.COURSENAME, B.TITLE, U.USER_NAME, B.REGDATE FROM REVIEWBOARD B, USER_INFO U WHERE B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO and U.USER_NO =#{user_no} ORDER BY B.REGDATE DESC
